entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ogoki Post Airport 12:56 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.6°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -14.5°C
Wind: NNE 21 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:29 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:29 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:29 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 20. Forecast issued 11:29 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
